item.title: Siemens to set up IMS lab
item.description: PETALING JAYA: Siemens Malaysia Sdn Bhd plans to open an IMS (Internet Protocol Multimedia Subsystem) applications testing laboratory in Malaysia soon.

item.title: Kompakar wins ITIL certification
item.description: PETALING JAYA: Kompakar eRetail Sdn Bhd, a subsidiary of Kompakar Inc Bhd, has been successfully awarded the Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) certification.

item.title: MCMC, Mynic seek domain name feedback
item.description: PETALING JAYA: Mynic, Malaysia’s designated country-code top level domain name managing organisation, and the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) are seeking a second round of public feedback on their plan to bring back second-level domain names.
